text: You know a game flew under the radar when it doesn't even have 10 reviews on Steam. Looks like a fun multiplayer game that mixes Bomberman and Splatoon, but the lack of online multiplayer really hurt it. What's for sure, it has some very solid upbeat tracks.
author: SupraDarky
